de.polygonal.ds.ArrayConvert

type
class

Helper class for converting arrays to various collections.

Static Methods

toArray2<T>(x : Array<toArray2.T>, width : Int, height : Int) : Array2<toArray2.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x.length < width * height (debug only).
Converts the array x to a two-dimensional array with dimensions width and height.

toArray3<T>(x : Array<toArray3.T>, width : Int, height : Int, depth : Int) : Array3<toArray3.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x.length < width * height * depth (debug only).
Converts the array x to a three-dimensional array with dimensions width, height and depth.

toArrayedQueue<T>(x : Array<toArrayedQueue.T>) : ArrayedQueue<toArrayedQueue.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to an arrayed queue.
The size of the queue is the nearest power of 2 of a.length.

toArrayedStack<T>(x : Array<toArrayedStack.T>) : ArrayedStack<toArrayedStack.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to an arrayed stack.
The size of the stack equals x.length.

toDA<T>(x : Array<toDA.T>) : DA<toDA.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to a dense array.
The size of the dense array equals x.length.

toDLL<T>(x : Array<toDLL.T>) : DLL<toDLL.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to a doubly linked list.
The size of the linked list equals x.length.

toLinkedQueue<T>(x : Array<toLinkedQueue.T>) : LinkedQueue<toLinkedQueue.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to a linked queue.
The size of the queue equals x.length.

toLinkedStack<T>(x : Array<toLinkedStack.T>) : LinkedStack<toLinkedStack.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to a linked stack.
The size of the stack equals x.length.

toSLL<T>(x : Array<toSLL.T>) : SLL<toSLL.T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is null (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError x is empty (debug only).
Converts the array x to a singly linked list.
The size of the linked list equals x.length.
